PropertyList.title: Mirage 2000

key.name: b
key.desc: On ground : brakes. On fly : Airbrakes

key.name: R
key.desc: Activate/desactivate targeting (the target have to be below radar range)

PropertyList.line: === Take Off ===
Start the Engine (use autostart or follow the procedure (in tutorial)
Around 170/190 kts : Take off
195 kts : limit to down the gears
280 kts : Never Exceed speed with gear out
=== Cruise ===
The mirage 2000 cruise altitude is around 35 000 feet to 40 000 feet.(Best Alt for a mach 2 flight)
It have the possibility to fly above 50 000 feet but the pilot should have a special equipment (not simulated yet)
1700l dropable tank aren't supersonic
=== Low alt Flying ===
The mirage can perform low alt flying. At these altitude the better is to use ground following AP
In order to do that : Click on AP. Then on Alt. This will activate Altitude AP. the selected altitude is setable with the left MFD.
Then click again on Alt. Then button in now blinking. You have selected Ground following. On the left MFD, now is displayed selected Alt above terrain.
=== Landing ===
195 kts : limit to down the gears
175 kts : Approach Speed
155 kts : Landing speed with 15% fuel and 2 AAM
Once touch down, depending of runway length, you can only use brake or use the parachute
When heavily loaded, the FBW have the possibility to lower the limit in order to save the structure
Mirage2000=>Options=> Change A/A to CHARGES
Afterburners engage when
throttle moves pass 85%
To fire a guided Missile, select A/A missile with "w",
activate "lock" with R, aim with the HUD and fire with "e"
Beware : The Airbrakes are tricky, due to yasim simulating only the upper part. The FBW are limiting it in order to prevent total lost of control
